email_chain.subject: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV GRAIN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV GRAIN MASTER available for your wheat shipment from Buenos Aires to Rotterdam. Vessel details: DWT 75000, LOA 225m. Freight rate is $42/MT CIF. Laycan 15-20 October. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV GRAIN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $38/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV GRAIN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Apologies for the typo in the subject. Loading window is 48 hours, demurrage $10,000/day. Best I can do is $40/MT. Let me know.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV GRAIN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the update. Let's proceed. Please send the recap.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Wheat Shipment - MV GRAIN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Please find recap below:
- Commodity: Wheat
- Cargo Size: 50000MT
- Load Port: Buenos Aires
- Disch Port: Rotterdam
- Freight Rate: $40/MT CIF
- Laycan: 15-20 October
- Demurrage: $10,000/day

Let me know if any corrections needed.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Correction: Recap - Wheat Shipment - MV GRAIN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Apologies, I noticed a typo in the laycan. Correct laycan is 16-21 October. Please update your records.

Best,
Alex
